title: Implement Trie
algorithmDescription: Implement prefix tree (Trie) supporting insert, search, and startsWith operations
detailedDescription: Implement Trie with insert, search, and startsWith methods. Input: Number of operations followed by commands (insert word, search word, startsWith prefix). Output: Results of search and startsWith as true/false. Each node has children and isEndOfWord flag.
hints: Each node has 26 children (for a-z) or hashmap
Insert: traverse/create path for each character
Search: traverse path, check if last node is end of word
StartsWith: traverse path, return true if path exists
commonMistakes: Not marking end of word correctly
solutionApproach: TrieNode has children array/map and isEndOfWord flag. Insert: traverse trie, create nodes as needed, mark last as end. Search: traverse, check end flag. StartsWith: just check if path exists.
testCaseCriteria: All operations must be O(m) where m is word length. Should correctly distinguish between search and prefix matching.
